law.catch_line: Fish not to be taken other than by pole and line near dams.
law.text: No person shall take fish by any method other than pole and line in hand, for two hundred (200) yards below any dam on or across any stream except as otherwise provided by administrative regulation.
law.history: Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 265, sec. 23, efffective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 38, sec. 22. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 200, sec. 62. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 38, sec. 1; and ch. 78, sec. 22. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 25. -- Created 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 124, sec. 12.
